title: Adobe Advertising Cloud Ad Details

xdm:adId.title: Ad Identifier
xdm:adId.description: Identifier for the ad this event is associated with. Not related to the Ad-ID standard.

xdm:runtime.title: Runtime Type
xdm:runtime.description: Runtime of the ad unit itself. Not the runtime of the browser or the operating system.

xdm:adUnitType.title: Ad Unit Type
xdm:adUnitType.description: Identifier for the literal piece of code driving display of the ad in a browser/device.

xdm:promotedAssetId.title: Promoted Asset Identifier
xdm:promotedAssetId.description: Identifier for the underlying asset being promoted in the ad which this event is associated with.

xdm:creativeID.title: Creative Identifier
xdm:creativeID.description: Identifier for the creative which this event is associated with.

xdm:keywordID.title: Keyword Identifier
xdm:keywordID.description: Identifier for the keyword that the surfer used to search, which triggered this click event.

xdm:audienceID.title: Audience Identifier
xdm:audienceID.description: Identifier for the audience segment for which the ad is targeted.

xdm:adGroupID.title: Ad Group Identifier
xdm:adGroupID.description: Identifier for the adGroup which ad is displayed and triggered this click event.

xdm:campaignID.title: Campaign Identifier
xdm:campaignID.description: Identifier for the campaign that belongs to the current displayed advertisement which triggers this click event.

xdm:networkType.title: Network Type
xdm:networkType.description: Network type the click event came from a search advertisement or content advertisement.

meta:enum.search: Advertisement is displayed in Search Network
meta:enum.content: Advertisement is displayed in Content Network

xdm:matchType.title: matchType
xdm:matchType.description: Match type used to match keyword.
